thread.title: Valerie and Rina
thread.title_full: Valerie and Rina - Review of The Manhattan at Times Square Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: dreidventures
title: Valerie and Rina
text: I have traveled the world, and rarely do I take the time to write a review. I've been inspired to do so, by Valerie and her associate Rina. As rare as me writing a review, equally rare are the kindness, expertise and a genuine care exhibited by Valerie and Rina in today's hotel and hospitality industry. In particular, Valerie went the extra mile to transform a routine, impersonal hotel visit into one befitting the occasion, and did so by asking questions and making adjustments, and following-up. She broke the mold by caring and acting when she did not need to do so, and just when I thought she might be the only one left to act in such fashion, along came Rina acting in full support. I rate this hotel full five star solely because there are true and caring people like Valerie and Rina helping guests, truly caring and working to make a difference.
